definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: Timothy:I won't because I have the Dukang gene.
sentences.chinese: 我不会酒精中毒，因为我体内有杜康基因啊。

sentences.english: Here is anterior vermian atrophy of the cerebellum in a patient with chronic alcoholism.
sentences.chinese: 慢性酒精中毒病人小脑蚓前部萎缩。

sentences.english: The study was published in Alcoholism: Clinical &Experimental Research.
sentences.chinese: 该研究发表在《酒精中毒:临床及实验研究》期刊上。

sentences.english: Methods Clinical data were statistically analyzed for a group of cases with alcohol toxicosis.
sentences.chinese: 方法对酒精中毒患者的临床资料进行统计分析。

sentences.english: Can alcoholism as a consequence of drinking with clients be deemed a work-related injury?
sentences.chinese: 陪客户喝酒，酒精中毒，是否属于工伤？

sentences.english: Q. Is workaholism really a disease, like alcoholism ?
sentences.chinese: 工作狂真的是一种疾病，就像酒精中毒？

definition: to lead to death/to result in death
alcohol/ethanol CH3CH2OH/ethyl alcohol/also written 乙醇/grain alcohol
after drinking/under the influence of alcohol
to dissipate the effects of alcohol
to have one stomach's pumped/gastric lavage (medicine)
heavy drinking/to get drunk/to drink to excess
